insert into sea_admin (name, password, logincount, loginip, logintime, groupid, state) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logincount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update sea_admin set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logincount = #{logincount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, loginip = #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, logincount, loginip, logintime, groupid, state from sea_admin
